author: gcolvin
content:
I have added a discussions-to link to the Pain Relief proposal.
https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/update-eip-1-eip-pain-relief-7230/15082

author: gcolvin
content: We've added text to clarify the place of Working Groups in the editorial process and treat the Core Devs as the working group responsible for Core EIPs.  We've removed the Review and Last Call stages for Working Group EIPs -- working groups are responsible for their own process.  That means that the Editors maintain overall standards, but that the devs are free to keep Draft EIPs anywhere the want, move them through their process any way that they want, and impose any additional standards of quality, style, formatting etc. that they want.  We've added working-group fields to the Preamble they can use for that purpose, and they can add more if they want.

author: gcolvin
content: This is much closer to the original intent of our process, and I think satisfies most of the Core Devs needs without the risks and hassles of maintaining two repos.

author: _shemnon
content: Ready for last call.  Just needs an approval - https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7349
